title: Drop List Elements from the Left | Challenge
description: In this challenge, you will practice using Python's list slicing to remove a specified number of elements from the left side of a list.

meta.title: Python List Manipulation | Slice Notation | Challenge
meta.description: Learn how to use Python's slice notation to remove elements from the left of a list. Explore a coding challenge that tests your understanding of this fundamental list operation.
meta.keywords: Python, list manipulation, slice notation, coding challenge, programming tutorial
